intro: Belmontia debilis, commonly known as the slender belmontia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in areas with moist, shaded environments. Belmontia debilis is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and ability to thrive in humid, tropical climates.
